description: Try our easy to follow Char Siu Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Char Siu Pork Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, stir remaining marinade into liquid in pressure cooker. Set to sauté (see note) and boil rapidly for 10 minutes or until reduced and thickened. Serve pork with extra sauce and steamed broccoli. Note: If your pressure cooker does not have a sauté function, transfer cooking liquid to a small saucepan and boil until reduced.

Meanwhile, stir remaining marinade into liquid in pressure cooker. Set to sauté (see note) and boil rapidly for 10 minutes or until reduced and thickened. Serve pork with extra sauce and steamed broccoli. Note: If your pressure cooker does not have a sauté function, transfer cooking liquid to a small saucepan and boil until reduced.

Serve pork with extra sauce and steamed broccoli. Note: If your pressure cooker does not have a sauté function, transfer cooking liquid to a small saucepan and boil until reduced.

Serve pork with extra sauce and steamed broccoli. Note: If your pressure cooker does not have a sauté function, transfer cooking liquid to a small saucepan and boil until reduced.
